comments:
Description:
ClassCastException when delete Data and table items in attached report.

Build number:2.2.1.v20070820

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open attached report.(The second table shares result set from the data item.)
2. Select table and data items and press delete keyboard.

Expected result:
Two items are deleted

Actual result:
Fail to delete and pop up error dialog.

Error log:
